about_the_game:
Features and Functions

· Ultra-realistic VHS video simulation for an immersive experience.

· A wide variety of collectible items covering all aspects of childhood.

· 3 complete, themed levels, with ongoing expansion.

· Support for the latest technologies, including Lumen, Nanite, and DLSS.

Summary

Immerse yourself in this Chinese dreamcore exploration game, where you can momentarily escape the bustling present and drift into the hazy memories of the 2000s, collecting fragments of times gone by...

Levels

The Chinese Foyer: Under buzzing fluorescent lights and against yellowed wallpaper, childhood memories are scattered and reassembled in a surreal collage - familiar yet strange. While memories might tempt you to linger, remember: this is no longer home.

The Deserted Campus: Weather-worn blackboards, the echo of school bells, and desk surfaces etched with countless marks transport you back to days filled with study and sweat. Wander through empty hallways, past familiar dormitories and well-worn running tracks, taking one final glimpse at the afterglow of youth. Ironically, the place you once couldn't wait to leave has become the place you most long to return to.

The Old  Bathhouse: Mosaic tiles reflect dim light through rising steam, while the air carries the nostalgic scent of soap and talcum powder, evoking memories of carefree summer days. Yet, while you can revisit the past, you'll find these spaces hauntingly empty.

Gameplay

Explore without boundaries

Capture memories through your lens

Rediscover childhood pastimes

name: Millennium Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 from around 2016 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or newer
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 7 from 2018 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or newer
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Step into a dreamscape where Millennium meets Chinese dreamcore. Navigate through liminal spaces which are familiar yet uncanny spaces, unravel mysterious puzzles, and collect lost memories of the past days.
